All values here are in hex.
This is here for chickenspaceprogram to reference, feel free to ignore it.

Windows:

BACKSPACE:      08
DEL:            EO 53

UP_ARROW:       E0 48
DOWN_ARROW:     E0 50
LEFT_ARROW:     E0 4B
RIGHT_ARROW:    E0 4D

ESC:            1B

F1:             00 3B
F2:             00 3C
F3:             00 3D
F4:             00 3E
F5:             00 3F
F6:             00 40
F7:             00 41
F8:             00 42
F9:             00 43
F10:            00 44
F11:
F12:            E0 86


MacOS/*nix:

BACKSPACE:      7F
DEL:            1B 5B 33 7E

UP_ARROW:       1B 5B 41
DOWN_ARROW:     1B 5B 42
LEFT_ARROW:     1B 5B 44
RIGHT_ARROW:    1B 5B 43

ESC:            1B

F1:             1B 4F 50
F2:             1B 4F 51
F3:             1B 4F 52
F4:             1B 4F 53
F5:             1B 5B 31 35 7E
F6:             1B 5B 31 37 7E
F7:             1B 5B 31 38 7E
F8:             1B 5B 31 39 7E
F9:             1B 5B 32 30 7E
F10:            1B 5B 32 31 7E
F11:            
F12:            1B 5B 32 34 7E
